description:
In their short time together Ponygon and Kafk unlock their second spell and win their first battle! Exhausted and relieved, they collapse. Laila brings back a fragment of the Stone of Moonlight to help restore their strength. She also warns them that thei
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Red Spell Book of Promise!
守り抜け! 約束の赤い魔本
